articles.title: Brain fog after Covid linked to blood clots - study - BBC
articles.description: A UK study links two proteins in the blood of hospital patients to thinking and memory problems.
articles.content:
Blood clots in the brain or the lungs might explain some common symptoms of "long Covid", including brain fog and fatigue, a UK study suggests.

articles.content:
